title: OSP and WHIG Establish Daily Intelligence-Propaganda Coordination Meetings
description: Office of Special Plans and White House Iraq Group establish daily coordination meetings to synchronize intelligence production with propaganda messaging operations. The meetings ensure OSP intelligence products directly support WHIG's public messaging campaigns and media coordination efforts.
significance: Institutionalizes coordination between intelligence manipulation and propaganda operations, creating systematic process for converting fabricated intelligence into public messaging.
